paper_abstract: By counting the coset leaders for cosets of weight 3 of the Melas code we give a new proof for the characterization of Kloosterman sums divisible by 3 for F(2m) where m is odd. New results due to Charpin, Helleseth and Zinoviev then provide a connection to a characterization of all a epsilon F(2m) such that Tr(a(1/3)) = 0; we prove a generalization to the case Tr(a(1/(2k-1))) = 0. We present an application to constructing caps in PG(n, 2) with many free pairs of points.
paper_title: On binary Kloosterman sums divisible by 3
